GSD.description:
video: fbdev: nvidiafb: Use strscpy() to prevent buffer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 580e5d3815474b8349250c25c16416585a72c7fe. For more details please see the references link.
